headline: Ecolab (ECL) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Momentum And Premium P/E Ratio
summary: Why Ecolab stock is on investors’ radar Ecolab (ECL) has attracted fresh attention after its recent share performance, with the stock showing positive total returns over the past month, past 3 months and year. See our latest analysis for Ecolab. With the share price at $281.99 and a 30-day share price return of 7.37%, recent gains build on a 9.53% 90-day share price return and a 3-year total shareholder return of 89.98%. This points to sustained momentum rather than just a short-term move. If...
